entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , La Tuque
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:15 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: La Tuque 06:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.0 kPa rising
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -38
Dewpoint: -38.3°C
Wind: WSW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 18.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 46 this morning and minus 24 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Light snow. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21 with temperature rising to minus 16 by morning. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
